text: The El Mouradia Palace is the official workplace and residence of the president of Algeria. It is in the El Mouradia neighborhood overlooking Algiers. It is often referred to simply as the Algerian presidentâ€™s office. Initially, Ahmed Ben Bella, the first president of independent Algeria, used the Summer Palace, previously occupied by French governors, for his offices, while residing at Villa Joly. Category:Algiers Category:Palaces
title: El Mouradia Palace
